contest-event.event-date:
May 13, 2000 D Northern Counties Open Contest
Northern Counties Open Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
northern-counties-open-contest
None
Reid Hall, Forfar, Angus, Scotland, UK Most Entertaining Programme - Johnstone Silver Best Solo Performance - Eb Bass from Tullis Russell Mills Band. Winning Conductor - Micheal Marzella Best Percussion Section - Turriff Silver. Best NCBBA Band - Bon-Accord Silver. Best Non NCBBA Band - Broxburn Public.
Best 1st Section Band - Kingdom Brass Best 2nd Section Band - Johnstone Silver Best 3rd Section Band - Livingston Brass Best 4th Section Band - Bon Accord Silver B Band
Programme for Bon-Accord Silver Band: Olympic Fanfare & Theme, Every-time We Say Goodbye, Minuano, Love Lilt, and the final movement of Firestorm.
Programme for Bon-Accord Silver B Band: The Haslemere Suite (Final Movement), I Will Follow Him, No Matter What, and the final movement of Contrasten.
June 15, 2014, 5:42 p.m. June 15, 2014, 5:49 p.m.
1 Broxburn Public Band Michael Marzella
2 Johnstone Band Raymond Tennant
3 Kingdom Brass Gavin Lindsay
4 Bon-Accord Silver Band Tony Swainson
5 Granite City Brass Edward Paley
6 Turriff Silver Band Moira Ross
7 Livingston Brass Alan Samson
8 Tullis Russell Mills John Morahan
9 Bon-Accord Silver B Band Bruce Wallace
10 Arbroath Instrumental Michael Robertson
11 Perthshire Brass George Annan Snr
12 Forfar Instrumental Ronald Cook

Unknown Result Perthshire Brass Elaine Stewart
